knimeNode.name: File Cells to Port
knimeNode.shortDescription: Turns a table with file store cells into a port object for use with Generic KNIME Nodes.

fullDescription.intro: The Port to File Cells node can be used to turn a GKN port object into a table for use in loops and with the cluster extension. This node works the other way around, turning those cells back into port objects.
fullDescription.option: The column containing the file store cells
